6 namespace Ubiquity\cache;

8 use Ubiquity\cache\traits\ModelsCacheTrait;
9 use Ubiquity\cache\traits\RestCacheTrait;
10 use Ubiquity\cache\traits\RouterCacheTrait;
11 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UFileSystem;
12 use mindplay\annotations\AnnotationCache;
13 use mindplay\annotations\AnnotationManager;
14 use mindplay\annotations\Annotations;
15 
25 class CacheManager extends RouterCacheTrait,ModelsCacheTrait,RestCacheTrait {
26 
31  public static $cache;
32  private static $cacheDirectory;
33 
40  public static function start(&$config) {
41  self::$cacheDirectory = self::initialGetCacheDirectory ( $config );
42  $cacheDirectory = \ROOT . \DS . self::$cacheDirectory;
43  Annotations::$config ['cache'] = new AnnotationCache ( $cacheDirectory . '/annotations' );
44  self::register ( Annotations::getManager () );
45  self::getCacheInstance ( $config, $cacheDirectory, ".cache" );
46  }
47 
53  public static function startProd(&$config) {
54  self::$cacheDirectory = self::initialGetCacheDirectory ( $config );
55  $cacheDirectory = \ROOT . \DS . self::$cacheDirectory;
56  self::getCacheInstance ( $config, $cacheDirectory, ".cache" );
57  }
58 
59  protected static function getCacheInstance(&$config, $cacheDirectory, $postfix) {
60  $cacheSystem = 'Ubiquity\cache\system\ArrayCache';
61  $cacheParams = [ ];
62  if (! isset ( self::$cache )) {
63  if (isset ( $config ["cache"] ["system"] )) {
64  $cacheSystem = $config ["cache"] ["system"];
65  }
66  if (isset ( $config ["cache"] ["params"] )) {
67  $cacheParams = $config ["cache"] ["params"];
68  }
69  self::$cache = new $cacheSystem ( $cacheDirectory, $postfix, $cacheParams );
70  }
71  return self::$cache;
72  }
73 
74  private static function initialGetCacheDirectory(&$config) {
75  return $config ["cache"] ["directory"] ?? ($config ["cache"] ["directory"] = "cache" . \DS);
76  }
77 
83  public static function getCacheDirectory() {
84  return self::$cacheDirectory;
85  }
86 
92  public static function getAbsoluteCacheDirectory() {
93  return \ROOT . \DS . self::$cacheDirectory;
94  }
95 
102  public static function getCacheSubDirectory($subDirectory) {
103  return \ROOT . \DS . self::$cacheDirectory . \DS . $subDirectory;
104  }
105 
113  public static function checkCache(&$config, $silent = false) {
114  $dirs = self::getCacheDirectories ( $config, $silent );
115  foreach ( $dirs as $dir ) {
116  self::safeMkdir ( $dir );
117  }
118  return $dirs;
119  }
120 
128  public static function getCacheDirectories(&$config, $silent = false) {
129  $cacheDirectory = self::initialGetCacheDirectory ( $config );
130  $rootDS = \ROOT . \DS;
131  if (! $silent) {
132  echo "cache directory is " . UFileSystem::cleanPathname ( $rootDS . $cacheDirectory ) . "\n";
133  }
134  $cacheDirectory = $rootDS . $cacheDirectory . \DS;
135  $modelsDir = str_replace ( "\\", \DS, $config ["mvcNS"] ["models"] );
136  $controllersDir = str_replace ( "\\", \DS, $config ["mvcNS"] ["controllers"] );
137  $annotationCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . "annotations";
138  $modelsCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . $modelsDir;
139  $queriesCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . "queries";
140  $controllersCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . $controllersDir;
141  $viewsCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . "views";
142  $seoCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . "seo";
143  $gitCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . "git";
144  $contentsCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . "contents";
145  return [ "annotations" => $annotationCacheDir,"models" => $modelsCacheDir,"controllers" => $controllersCacheDir,"queries" => $queriesCacheDir,"views" => $viewsCacheDir,"seo" => $seoCacheDir,"git" => $gitCacheDir,"contents" => $contentsCacheDir ];
146  }
147 
148  private static function safeMkdir($dir) {
149  if (! is_dir ( $dir ))
150  return mkdir ( $dir, 0777, true );
151  }
152 
159  public static function clearCache(&$config, $type = "all") {
160  $cacheDirectories = self::checkCache ( $config );
161  $cacheDirs = [ "annotations","controllers","models","queries","views","contents" ];
162  foreach ( $cacheDirs as $typeRef ) {
163  self::_clearCache ( $cacheDirectories, $type, $typeRef );
164  }
165  }
166 
167  private static function _clearCache($cacheDirectories, $type, $typeRef) {
168  if ($type === "all" || $type === $typeRef)
169  UFileSystem::deleteAllFilesFromFolder ( $cacheDirectories [$typeRef] );
170  }
171 
178  public static function initCache(&$config, $type = "all", $silent = false) {
179  self::checkCache ( $config, $silent );
180  self::start ( $config );
181  if ($type === "all" || $type === "models")
182  self::initModelsCache ( $config, false, $silent );
183  if ($type === "all" || $type === "controllers")
184  self::initRouterCache ( $config, $silent );
185  if ($type === "all" || $type === "rest")
186  self::initRestCache ( $config, $silent );
187  }
188 
194  public static function getAllRoutes() {
195  $routes = self::getControllerCache ();
196  return array_merge ( $routes, self::getControllerCache ( true ) );
197  }
198 
207  protected static function _getFiles(&$config, $type, $silent = false) {
208  $typeNS = $config ["mvcNS"] [$type];
209  $typeDir = \ROOT . \DS . str_replace ( "\\", \DS, $typeNS );
210  if (! $silent)
211  echo \ucfirst ( $type ) . " directory is " . \ROOT . $typeNS . "\n";
212  return UFileSystem::glob_recursive ( $typeDir . \DS . '*' );
213  }
214 
215  private static function register(AnnotationManager $annotationManager) {
216  $annotationManager->registry = array_merge ( $annotationManager->registry, [
217  'id' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\IdAnnotation',
218  'manyToOne' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\ManyToOneAnnotation',
219  'oneToMany' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\OneToManyAnnotation',
220  'manyToMany' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\ManyToManyAnnotation',
221  'joinColumn' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\JoinColumnAnnotation',
222  'table' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\TableAnnotation',
223  'transient' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\TransientAnnotation',
224  'column' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\ColumnAnnotation',
225  'validator' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\ValidatorAnnotation',
226  'transformer' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\TransformerAnnotation',
227  'joinTable' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\JoinTableAnnotation',
228  'requestMapping' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\router\RouteAnnotation',
229  'route' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\router\RouteAnnotation',
230  'get' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\router\GetAnnotation',
231  'getMapping' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\router\GetAnnotation',
232  'post' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\router\PostAnnotation',
233  'postMapping' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\router\PostAnnotation',
234  'var' => 'mindplay\annotations\standard\VarAnnotation',
235  'yuml' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\YumlAnnotation',
236  'rest' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\rest\RestAnnotation',
237  'authorization' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\rest\AuthorizationAnnotation',
238  'injected' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\di\InjectedAnnotation',
239  'autowired' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\di\AutowiredAnnotation' ] );
240  }
